itunes:title: #58: Living A life With Regrets
title: #58: Living A life With Regrets
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Many of us can relate to having a few regrets. But what happens when you feel frozen by them and ruminate? In this episode, we talk about moving forward, making new meaning, and understanding that everything that is for you is for you! You have not...
itunes:summary:
Many of us can relate to having a few regrets. But what happens when you feel frozen by them and ruminate?

In this episode, we talk about moving forward, making new meaning, and understanding that everything that is for you is for you! You have not missed your opportunity.

 

MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE

  • Register for the Self Love Experience – Enroll Now
  • Recovery School Waitlist – Join the List
  • Start Your Own Healing Circles – BlackGirlHealingCircles.com
